shortdesc.p: The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant add-on provides support for helping technical documentation writers generate, re-write content, overview and research. It also supports performing AI checks and AI-based modifications on multiple files by integrating AI extensions with XML technologies like Schematron or XSLT.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant add-on provides support for helping technical documentation writers generate, re-write content, overview and research. It also supports performing AI checks and AI-based modifications on multiple files by integrating AI extensions with XML technologies like Schematron or XSLT.
